name: Coral Drake
description: The Coral Drake is a Medium-sized dragon with formidable physical attributes and a striking presence. Its features enable it to thrive in aquatic environments, with a coloration that aids in camouflage.
memorable: The Coral Drake's ability to unleash tiny hatchling drakes as an area attack makes it particularly unique and fearsome.
goals: Typically seeks to dominate its aquatic territory and eliminate threats in its environment.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other aquatic creatures or as a master of lesser drakes.
environment: Usually found in aquatic and underwater habitats.
strengths: Possesses high hit points and is adept at physical combat with piercing damage capabilities and poison effects.
weaknesses: Limited mobility and capabilities on dry land due to its requirement for water breathing.
attacks: Can perform a Multiattack with a powerful Bite and two Spined Fin strikes, or utilize a Stinger attack with potential poison effects.
most_powerful_ability: Biting Breath ability that releases ravenous hatchling drakes in a 15-foot cone, risking blindness and significant piercing damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision with a range of 120 feet and exceptional passive Perception of 17.
skills: Has strong skill proficiencies in Acrobatics, Stealth, and notably high Perception for detecting hidden foes.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and condition immunity to poisoned.
Ability to breathe only underwater due to its Water Breathing trait.
Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when submerged, enhancing its stealth capabilities.
Damage resistance to cold damage which adds to its survivability in icy waters.
High Constitution and Dexterity scores allowing for robust defenses and agility in combat.
